description: This file defines the interface IZigWave for ZigBee Wave devices within the WPEFramework, specifying methods for device management, binding, unbinding, and device enumeration.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: Interface for ZigBee Wave device management, providing methods to control device acceptance mode, retrieve device metadata, list devices, and manage bindings.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Sets or queries whether a device at a given address can be added to the network.

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a device at a specified ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Returns an iterator over IDs of all currently available devices.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Creates a binding between a source and destination device.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes a binding between a source and destination device.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
